website_summaries.verdict: This well-deigned doll’s ability to talk and sing is great on its own, but the kid-friendly “smartphone” that interacts with Dora is a real treat for fans of the show.
pros: Dora’s shirt and phone lights up
Make calls and listen to Dora’s friends
Includes brush, doll-sized phone, and batteries
cons: Phone and doll must re-sync every time they are turned on

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Doll arrived in retaped, busted up box, the batteries were corroded, and even with new batteries, it did not work. The tab that was supposed to be removed was already gone. Since when does amazon sell used items? It was supposed to be a new gift, not a garage sale reject. Last 3 purchases from amazon have been junk. Whats going on?
customer_reviews.author: Suzybull

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm beyond impressed...I can't get over that this doll was $13 and says things in English and Spanish. My 1 year old loves Dora and almost loves the phone it comes with more. I read reviews about the hand falling off but I haven't had any issues and my daughter drops it on the floor all the time. It seems like it's on there pretty good. Great quality and amazing price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old granddaughter as A VERY WANTED Christmas gift really the only thing she asked for. She opened it and was so excited she kissed the box screaming I got my Dora phone. Needless to say 20 mins later the hand with the phone on it broke off. Obviously a very weak point in the design . I haven't had time to return it yet. I have Never ever had any problems with past purchases.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDI

customer_reviews.title: like the instructions say
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this toy for my daughter's 4th birthday and she was beyond thrilled she opened the gift. This toy does talk and so does the phone, but they do NOT interact with each other. I've pressed Dora's jewels and then the phone, like the instructions say, but the two do not talk to each other or interact. And some reviewers say they talk in Spanish...this Dora does not. My daughter still plays with it and I don't think she realizes it's not doing what it claims to be able to do. But she still likes to talk to Dora and pretend with the phone on her own. I give this 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Decent toy, but just not as well received as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I bout this for a 2 year old, and I think she was just to young for it. The whole concept of Dora talking with her phone just seemed way cooler on the commercials. This toy just seemed annoying. My daughter now plays with the two toys separately. She uses the phone as a toy phone and the doll is just a baby. She also only watched the original Dora, so the Dora and friends doll does not resemble the Dora she knows. This is probably a great toy for an older girl who is into the show.
customer_reviews.author: KatieDC

customer_reviews.title: I Love You Dora 🤗
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year old Granddaughter loved this Dora doll. She was excited. She & Dora are enjoying their many 📳 Mobile Conversations. She took Dora to school with her the next day. 👏🏼👏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Machelle Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3-6 yr olds
customer_reviews.text: Sooo great but my daughter misplace her phone and it was new but very good for girls that actually love pretend talking and everything
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect a lot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged for this for the months leading up to xmas. I thought it did a lot more than what it actually does. My daughter was so excited but hasn't played with it since xmas morning. She thought Dora would actually call her (darn commercials) and all it really does is lights up the phone and her shirt at the same time. She sings and talks but that is it. I think my little girl is pretty disappointed in this toy, despite the fact that I prepared her for the worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cute but loud!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. She sang along with it all the time. Me as a parent couldn't stand it!! It's a very loud toy. But if my girl likes it I can deal.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it but frustrating "phone"
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this doll so much that I had to order two. However, the "phone" has a little trouble communicating with the doll. We followed all directions and I would say it works 15% of the time. My older child was frustrated with that. They like it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: iheartamazon

customer_reviews.title: We super glued her hand back on
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll, both of them, meaning we had to return the first one to fisher price after one day, The hand broke off, a month later we got her new one and this time it lasted two days before the hand broke off. We super glued her hand back on, because what is the point of sending it back if it will break again. Super glue seems to be doing a great job though. She is a little loud, but if you put tape over the speakers in the back it muffles the sound so it isn't as loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised, Ok Doll
customer_reviews.text: The description is terribly misleading - Dora doesn't respond to the cell phone or interact with it at all, in any way. This is a Dora doll that plays songs (loudly) when you press a button on her chest, and a (loud) cell phone that runs through some cute calls. Pros: It's cute, it's Dora, the kiddos love it. Cons: Not as advertised, and it's frustrating to try to set up imaginary features.

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Nickelodeon Dora & Friends Talking Dora & Smartphone
product_meta.description: Together, all for one! Dora and her friends know that they can always call on each other for help and good times, and now you can call them too! This 11.5’’ Dora doll arrives looking just like she does on the Dora & Friends television show—complete with soft hair, signature outfit and her magic charm bracelet! Dora also comes with her smartphone and a special one for you too! Dora will magically respond to and interact with your special phone and when she talks and sings, her shirt and charm bracelet will light up and sparkle! Use your magical smartphone to talk to Dora’s friends and discover new places in Playa Verde using the Map App! Over 50 phrases, sounds, and a song from the TV show add to the adventure! For more fun and features, you can look for the Fisher-Price Dora & Friends dolls! Each friend comes with an adventure charm that plays ringtones & phrases in your magical smartphone!
feature_bullets: Join Dora on her adventures in Playa Verde!
Dora is dressed in her signature outfit and magical charm bracelet!
Dora comes with her smartphone and a special phone you can use to talk to Dora and her friends!
Dora’s shirt and charm bracelet light up!
Features lights, sounds, phrases and a song from the Dora & Friends television show!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars303 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
